forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 5am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
